
John is having tokens of all the number starting from 1 to a certain amount. He has to calculate total amount of these tokens. He will enter the highest amount of token , then you have to tell sum of all tokens starting from 1 to highest.
Example if he enters 5 then you have to calculate 1+2+3+4+5.


Input
Input will consist of single number showing  upper limit of token.


Output
Output will consist of single number which will show sum of  total amount .


Example

Input:
10

Output:
55
